mil7.7.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘cittakadharakummassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.3:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, cittakadharakummo udakabhaya udakam parivajjetva vicarati, taya ca pana udakam parivajjanaya ayuna na parihayati;
mil7.7.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena pamade bhayadassavina bhavitabbam, appamade gunavisesadassavina.
mil7.7.3:1.4: Taya ca pana bhayadassavitaya na parihayati samanna, nibbanassa santike upeti.
mil7.7.3:1.5: Idam, maharaja, cittakadharakummassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
